description: First floor side to front extension; alterations and extension to roof; rear dormer; window in end gable; external alterations
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;">The proposed two storey front extension, by reason of
inappropriate design, would have an obtrusive and conspicuous appearance,
resulting in an unsympathetic extension of the building, at odds with the
appearance of the host dwellinghouse and the prevailing character of the area, to the
detriment of the character and appearance the area, <span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">&nbsp;contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National
Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3 (D.1 and D.11) of The London Plan
(2021), Policy DM1 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan document
(2013) and the relevant provisions of the adopted Harrow Supplementary Planning
Document Residential Design Guide (2010).</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><br></span><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;">The proposed rear dormer by reason of its overall scale would
result in an discordant and ungainly roof extension which would be detrimental
to the character and appearance of the original dwelling and surrounding street
scene and would be contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the
National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3 (D.1 and D.11) of The
London Plan (2021), Policy DM1 of the Development Management Policies Local
Plan document (2013) and the relevant provisions of the adopted Harrow
Supplementary Planning Document Residential Design Guide (2010).</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><o:p></o:p></p>
